abstract: Given that the Illinois attorney general’s office is planning to file a civil lawsuit against Countrywide Financial and its chief executive, Angelo Mozilo – alleging unfair and deceptive practices in mortgage loans – Mr. Mozilo must be crossing his fingers (twice!) that the Bank of America deal occurs.
